translated_text:
Samoan: O tagata e i ai lea ’itua’iga mafaufauga lea e fuafua lelei manatu, e mafai ona tauloto fa’agasologa, fōfō fa’afitauli ma galulue i suega fa’asaienisi. 
English:: The language is a Western Samoan language, with a few differences from the standard language spoken in Samoa.

text: E fiafia Oselota e 'ai ni tamaʻi manu. Latou te puʻeina manuki, gata, isumu ma manulele pe a latou mafaia. Toetoe lava o meaola uma e pu’e e le oselota e sili atu ona laiti nai lo ia.
translated_text:
Samoan: E fiafia Oselota e 'ai ni tamaʻi manu. Latou te puʻeina manuki, gata, isumu ma manulele pe a latou mafaia. Toetoe lava o meaola uma e pu’e e le oselota e sili atu ona laiti nai lo ia. 
English:: The Samoa people eat a very simple diet. They eat fish, meat, and vegetables. They do not eat any nuts, except for palm nuts.

text: O isi meapu’e ata e fa’aaogāina le ituaiga o le 6 i le 6 cm, e sili atu le manino o le 56 i le 56 mm negative.
translated_text:
Samoan: O isi meapu’e ata e fa’aaogāina le ituaiga o le 6 i le 6 cm, e sili atu le manino o le 56 i le 56 mm negative. 
English:: Standard: The size of the film is 6 by 6 cm, slightly smaller than a 56 by 56 mm negative.

text: O tagata malaga e fautuaina malosi ina ia fa’aeteete i aafiaga mata’utia o le tau e lamatia ai o latou nofoaga auā e ono afaina ai ni fuafuaga i malaga.
translated_text:
Samoan: O tagata malaga e fautuaina malosi ina ia fa’aeteete i aafiaga mata’utia o le tau e lamatia ai o latou nofoaga auā e ono afaina ai ni fuafuaga i malaga. 
English:: Samoa: A matoa is a small boat that is used for fishing, and is similar to a canoa.

text: E tuua e pasi le fale fa’atalipasi i le va o itumalō (i le isi itu o le vaitafe) i le aso, e ui o le tele, aemaise lava i latou e malaga i le itu i sasa’e ma Jakar/Bumthang ma o ‘ese i le va o le 06:30 ma le 07:30.
translated_text:
Samoan: E tuua e pasi le fale fa’atalipasi i le va o itumalō (i le isi itu o le vaitafe) i le aso, e ui o le tele, aemaise lava i latou e malaga i le itu i sasa’e ma Jakar/Bumthang ma o ‘ese i le va o le 06:30 ma le 07:30. 
English: The bus departs the bus station in the morning (starting at 6:30 am) and arrives at Jakar/Bumthang at around 7:30 pm.

text: Latou te fa’amautinoaina ua mau lelei le saofa’i o le tagata ti’eti’e ae e iai popolega o le saogalemū ona e ono mau le vae i le mea e tuu ai vae (stirrup).
translated_text:
Samoan: Latou te fa’amautinoaina ua mau lelei le saofa’i o le tagata ti’eti’e ae e iai popolega o le saogalemū ona e ono mau le vae i le mea e tuu ai vae (stirrup). 
English:: A saddle is a seat for a horse, usually made of leather, with a stirrup attached to the back.

text: O le tele o Vaa mo tafaoga ‘ese’ese i Paletika e atagia ai le toe fa’aopoopoina o le nofo ai i St. Petersburg i Lusia.
translated_text:
Samoan: O le tele o Vaa mo tafaoga ‘ese’ese i Paletika e atagia ai le toe fa’aopoopoina o le nofo ai i St. Petersburg i Lusia. 
English:: The cruise ship will sail from Samoa to St. Petersburg, Russia.

text: O fautuaga ua fa’ailoa ai o tagata faimalaga e le gaoi, solitofaga, auai i vaega o maketi fa’asolitulafono, aisi, po o le fa’aaogā o isi tagata mo lo latou lelei.
translated_text:
Samoan: O fautuaga ua fa’ailoa ai o tagata faimalaga e le gaoi, solitofaga, auai i vaega o maketi fa’asolitulafono, aisi, po o le fa’aaogā o isi tagata mo lo latou lelei. 
English:: If you are traveling in Samoa, you can buy a SIM card from any local store, or from the post office, but you will not be able to make calls unless you have a mobile phone.

text: E tele mea e tatau ona e mafaufau iai muamua ae e te le i malaga ma le taimi ua e malaga ai i se isi nofoaga.
translated_text:
Samoan: E tele mea e tatau ona e mafaufau iai muamua ae e te le i malaga ma le taimi ua e malaga ai i se isi nofoaga. 
English:: Samoa: This is a small, sparsely populated island country

text: I le ‘aasa o le la, e mafai ona oo tagata malaga i le fa’asēsēina o mafaufauga lea e maua ai le vaaia o vai e le o iai (po o isi mea).
translated_text:
Samoan: I le ‘aasa o le la, e mafai ona oo tagata malaga i le fa’asēsēina o mafaufauga lea e maua ai le vaaia o vai e le o iai (po o isi mea). 
English:: Samoa: This is a "land of the long tail," meaning that the tail of the distribution is long and heavy (see Figure below ).

text: O aiga ma tamaiti e seāseā vaaia, ae o nisi nofotumau latou te taliaina i latou i potu fa’apitoa.
translated_text:
Samoan: O aiga ma tamaiti e seāseā vaaia, ae o nisi nofotumau latou te taliaina i latou i potu fa’apitoa. 
English:: Samoa: The main language is Tahitian, though English is widely used.

text: Mo se fa’ata’ita’iga o asiasiga i ‘olo i le Vanu o Loire, o le Vanu o Rhine po o le alu i se malaga a se vaa tele i aai matagofie i luga o Danube po o vaa alo i le Erie Canal.
translated_text:
Samoan: Mo se fa’ata’ita’iga o asiasiga i ‘olo i le Vanu o Loire, o le Vanu o Rhine po o le alu i se malaga a se vaa tele i aai matagofie i luga o Danube po o vaa alo i le Erie Canal. 
English:: The French region of Loire Valley, the Rhine valley and the Danube Valley are famous for their wines.

text: E sili atu le fa’aaogā o se ofisa malaga e masani ona faia malaga e tutusa ma lau malaga.
translated_text:
Samoan: E sili atu le fa’aaogā o se ofisa malaga e masani ona faia malaga e tutusa ma lau malaga. 
English:: The same: Samoa: No official currency, but the taka is equal to one dollar of the United States of America.

text: O le couchsurfing na fa’avaeina ia Ianuari 2004 ina ua maua e le ali’i polokalama komepiuta o Casey Fenton se malaga taugofie i Iceland ae leai se mea e nofo ai.
translated_text:
Samoan: O le couchsurfing na fa’avaeina ia Ianuari 2004 ina ua maua e le ali’i polokalama komepiuta o Casey Fenton se malaga taugofie i Iceland ae leai se mea e nofo ai. 
English:: The first ever couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 by computer programmer Casey Fenton.

text: O visa o tamaiti a’oga e masani ona iai mea ‘ese’ese e mana’omia ma fa’agasologa o pepa fa’atumu mai visa masani mo turisi po o le visa fa’apisinisi.
translated_text:
Samoan: O visa o tamaiti a’oga e masani ona iai mea ‘ese’ese e mana’omia ma fa’agasologa o pepa fa’atumu mai visa masani mo turisi po o le visa fa’apisinisi. 
English:: The visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.

text: O atunuu ta’itasi e iai tulafono fa’apitoa e mana’omia ai le iai o mea e tatau mo fa’alavelave fa’afuase’i i totonu o taavale.
translated_text:
Samoan: O atunuu ta’itasi e iai tulafono fa’apitoa e mana’omia ai le iai o mea e tatau mo fa’alavelave fa’afuase’i i totonu o taavale. 
English:: The tsunami warning system in Samoa is inoperative.

text: E ui o le tele o ofisa malaga e malilie e talia le taofiga masani o avanoa, o le tele o ofisa fa’apitoa mo ituaiga o malaga, fa’asoasoaina o le paketi po o le nofoaga autū e taunuu iai.
translated_text:
Samoan: E ui o le tele o ofisa malaga e malilie e talia le taofiga masani o avanoa, o le tele o ofisa fa’apitoa mo ituaiga o malaga, fa’asoasoaina o le paketi po o le nofoaga autū e taunuu iai. 
English:: If you are a male driver, you must wear a seat belt, even if you are not the driver of the car.

text: E ono vaaia e tagata malaga ni manu fa’alafuā e le masani ai i o latou atunuu.
translated_text:
Samoan: E ono vaaia e tagata malaga ni manu fa’alafuā e le masani ai i o latou atunuu. 
English:: The Samoa people: They are a Polynesian people who speak the Tongan language.

text: E le gata i lea i le itu i matū asiasi i le Malumalu matagofie o lo Matou Tama’ita’i o Fatima (Malumalu), o se nofoaga lauiloa i le lalolagi i le fa’aali mai ai o Maria.
translated_text:
Samoan: E le gata i lea i le itu i matū asiasi i le Malumalu matagofie o lo Matou Tama’ita’i o Fatima (Malumalu), o se nofoaga lauiloa i le lalolagi i le fa’aali mai ai o Maria. 
English:: The Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Malumalu) is a Marian shrine in Portugal.

text: E mafai ona e fa’aaogaina le boda-boda (uila afi la’upasese) e te fealua’i ai i Goma. O le tau masani lava e ~500 tupe Congo e totogi e ta’amilo ma e ti’eti’e ai mo se tama’i taimi.
translated_text:
Samoan: E mafai ona e fa’aaogaina le boda-boda (uila afi la’upasese) e te fealua’i ai i Goma. O le tau masani lava e ~500 tupe Congo e totogi e ta’amilo ma e ti’eti’e ai mo se tama’i taimi. 
English:: Boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) is a cheap and fast means of transportation in Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs (~$6) for a short ride.

text: Mo i latou e fiafia i gaioiga e fai i fafo, e taūa le savaliga i luga o le Sami aga’i auala o le Lagi.
translated_text:
Samoan: Mo i latou e fiafia i gaioiga e fai i fafo, e taūa le savaliga i luga o le Sami aga’i auala o le Lagi. 
English:: A moose is a large herbivore, similar to a elk or a moose.

text: O savaliga fa’asafari (e ta’ua foi o “savaliga i le vao”, “matamataga savavali i le safari”, po o le “savali”) e iai matamata savali, a lē mo ni nai itulā po o nai aso.
translated_text:
Samoan: O savaliga fa’asafari (e ta’ua foi o “savaliga i le vao”, “matamataga savavali i le safari”, po o le “savali”) e iai matamata savali, a lē mo ni nai itulā po o nai aso. 
English:: Safari (from the Swahili language for "exploration") is the term for an excursion into the wild, usually on foot, to see the scenery and wildlife.

text: Na o le pau lava le auala e vave alu ai o le lafo fa’a-’ato ua uma ona siaki. O tulafono a kamupanī vaalele e le fa’atagaina ai i latou e lafo ni ‘ato e aunoa ma se tagata malaga, lea e te sau ai i totonu.
translated_text:
Samoan: Na o le pau lava le auala e vave alu ai o le lafo fa’a-’ato ua uma ona siaki. O tulafono a kamupanī vaalele e le fa’atagaina ai i latou e lafo ni ‘ato e aunoa ma se tagata malaga, lea e te sau ai i totonu. 
English:: If you are traveling in Samoa, you will need a passport. The currency is the Samoa dollar, which is equal to one New Zealand dollar.

text: O le 300 fa’aopoopo na maua ai le aofa’iga o taavale solofanua e 1,300 ina ia fa’aitiitia ai le toatele.
translated_text:
Samoan: O le 300 fa’aopoopo na maua ai le aofa’iga o taavale solofanua e 1,300 ina ia fa’aitiitia ai le toatele. 
English:: Samoa: There are approximately 300 different languages spoken in Samoa, including the official language, Samoan.

text: O aiga e iai tamaiti laiti e ono mana’omia le tele o tapenapenaga, ae o se aso i fafo e faigofie lava e oo i pepe ma tamaiti a’oga fa’ata’ita’i.
translated_text:
Samoan: O aiga e iai tamaiti laiti e ono mana’omia le tele o tapenapenaga, ae o se aso i fafo e faigofie lava e oo i pepe ma tamaiti a’oga fa’ata’ita’i. 
English:: The Samoa is a small, open boat with a long, narrow deck.

text: O so o se tasi lava o le a ave’ave i mea maualuluga po o le pasia o luga o mauga e tatau ona mafaufau i le ono iai o ni kiona, aisa to’a, po o le tau malūlū.
translated_text:
Samoan: O so o se tasi lava o le a ave’ave i mea maualuluga po o le pasia o luga o mauga e tatau ona mafaufau i le ono iai o ni kiona, aisa to’a, po o le tau malūlū. 
English:: If you are a bird watcher, you will know that the best time to see the birds is in the morning or at sunset.

text: O aso nei, o Timbuktu o se aai e matitiva, e ui lava o lona ta’uleleia ua avea ai ma mata’aga mo turisi, ma e iai foi lona malaevaalele.
translated_text:
Samoan: O aso nei, o Timbuktu o se aai e matitiva, e ui lava o lona ta’uleleia ua avea ai ma mata’aga mo turisi, ma e iai foi lona malaevaalele. 
English:: The reason for this is that Timbuktu is a remote place, and it is difficult to get to for tourists, so the locals don't come.

text: I vaitau matuā malūlū, e la’titi sina taimi e to’ulu ai le kiona ma le mafai ai ona e alu.
translated_text:
Samoan: I vaitau matuā malūlū, e la’titi sina taimi e to’ulu ai le kiona ma le mafai ai ona e alu. 
English:: Samoa: The main food is fish, vegetables and palm oil.

text: Afai e te fia malaga taamilo i le lalolagi atoa i le Southern Hemisphere, o vaalele e filifili mai iai ma fa’asinomaga e limiti ona o le lē lava o alāvaa i isi itu o le vasa.
translated_text:
Samoan: Afai e te fia malaga taamilo i le lalolagi atoa i le Southern Hemisphere, o vaalele e filifili mai iai ma fa’asinomaga e limiti ona o le lē lava o alāvaa i isi itu o le vasa. 
English:: Samoa: The Cook Islands are an island country in the Southern Hemisphere, which is separated from the mainland by a narrow strait.

text: O kamupanī vaalele e pei o le Emirate, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airways ua matuā fa’alauteleina la latou ‘au’aunaga i Aferika, ma ofa fesoota’iga i le tele o taulaga tetele o Aferika i tau fa’atauva na i lo isi vaalele a Europa.
translated_text:
Samoan: O kamupanī vaalele e pei o le Emirate, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airways ua matuā fa’alauteleina la latou ‘au’aunaga i Aferika, ma ofa fesoota’iga i le tele o taulaga tetele o Aferika i tau fa’atauva na i lo isi vaalele a Europa. 
English: Airlines: Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airways are the main airlines that fly to Africa, offering flights to many African cities at competitive prices.

text: E leai se malaga fa’aopopo o iai ma e lē toe taofia nofoaafi i Wembley, ma lē toe avanoa paka taʻavale ma mea ti’eti’e uma i le paka i le lau’ele’ele.
translated_text:
Samoan: E leai se malaga fa’aopopo o iai ma e lē toe taofia nofoaafi i Wembley, ma lē toe avanoa paka taʻavale ma mea ti’eti’e uma i le paka i le lau’ele’ele. 
English:: Tickets are available on a first come, first served basis.

text: I se tulaga lautele, o le nofo i so o se atunuu ‘ese mo se taimi umi o le a mana’omia le faia muamua o sou visa.
translated_text:
Samoan: I se tulaga lautele, o le nofo i so o se atunuu ‘ese mo se taimi umi o le a mana’omia le faia muamua o sou visa. 
English:: Samoa: We do not require visitors to obtain a visa for short visits.

text: O nofoaafi uma e iai le MetroPlus ma tagata e fa’atonutonuina le Metro; o tagata fa’atonutonu o le MetroPlus e masani lava ona i le fa’atausi’usi’uga o le nofoaafi latalata i le Cape Town.
translated_text:
Samoan: O nofoaafi uma e iai le MetroPlus ma tagata e fa’atonutonuina le Metro; o tagata fa’atonutonu o le MetroPlus e masani lava ona i le fa’atausi’usi’uga o le nofoaafi latalata i le Cape Town. 
English:: The MetroPlus is slightly more expensive than the Metro; the MetroPlus fare is slightly more expensive than the regular Metro fare at Cape Town.

text: O tagata uma e auai i fa’apotopotoga ma fa’aaogā auala o femalaga’iga. Toeitiiti o tagata uma e faitio i auala o femalaga’iga.
translated_text:
Samoan: O tagata uma e auai i fa’apotopotoga ma fa’aaogā auala o femalaga’iga. Toeitiiti o tagata uma e faitio i auala o femalaga’iga. 
English:: A male lion is called a lion and a female lion is called a lioness.

text: Ona o le tauleai o ni tagata i lea nofoaga, o le malamalama fefiloi e le masani ona avea ma se fa’afitauli, o le a mafai foi ona e matamata fiafia i fetū.
translated_text:
Samoan: Ona o le tauleai o ni tagata i lea nofoaga, o le malamalama fefiloi e le masani ona avea ma se fa’afitauli, o le a mafai foi ona e matamata fiafia i fetū. 
English:: If you are a beginner, start with a medium to heavy-duty pair of shoes, preferably a boot.

text: O mea mana’omia i visa ma tau e le tutusa mai lea atunuu i lea atunuu ma e aafia i le atunuu e te sau mai ai.
translated_text:
Samoan: O mea mana’omia i visa ma tau e le tutusa mai lea atunuu i lea atunuu ma e aafia i le atunuu e te sau mai ai. 
English:: The visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from.

text: I so’u manatu lautele, e leai se mea e tilotilo ai fua i se pa’ū mo pisinisi po o le vasega o nofoaga muamua i malaga tu’usa’o mai le A i le B.
translated_text:
Samoan: I so’u manatu lautele, e leai se mea e tilotilo ai fua i se pa’ū mo pisinisi po o le vasega o nofoaga muamua i malaga tu’usa’o mai le A i le B. 
English:: Samoa: There are no official languages, but the local language is Tongan, which is similar to English.

text: O le togiina o le boomerang o se tomai lauiloa e tele turisi e fia mauaina.
translated_text:
Samoan: O le togiina o le boomerang o se tomai lauiloa e tele turisi e fia mauaina. 
English:s: A boomerang is a small, wooden, three-bladed throwing implement.

text: E le na o le pau lea o le faigāmalaga e te filifili mai iai pe a e mana’o e fa’amisi le Pasefika i Saute ma le talafatai i sisifo o Amerika i Saute. (silasila i lalo)
translated_text:
Samoan: E le na o le pau lea o le faigāmalaga e te filifili mai iai pe a e mana’o e fa’amisi le Pasefika i Saute ma le talafatai i sisifo o Amerika i Saute. (silasila i lalo) 
English:: The Samoa is a small, sparsely populated island country in the Pacific Ocean.

text: Ua fausia e San Fransico se atina’e turisi tele e iai le anoanoa’i o faletalimalō, fale’aiga, ma fale fono lelei ona fausia ma maualuga lona tulaga.
translated_text:
Samoan: Ua fausia e San Fransico se atina’e turisi tele e iai le anoanoa’i o faletalimalō, fale’aiga, ma fale fono lelei ona fausia ma maualuga lona tulaga. 
English:: San Francisco: A Guide to Getting Around

text: O le volenitia a o malaga o se auala lelei tele mo se suiga ae e lē na o le foa’i atu.
translated_text:
Samoan: O le volenitia a o malaga o se auala lelei tele mo se suiga ae e lē na o le foa’i atu. 
English:: If you are flying into a small airport, you may be able to walk to the terminal.

text: Atonu e le’i mafaufauina e tagata, o le onosa’i ma le malamalama e tāua mo tagata femalagaa’i ua toe fo'i mai i aiga.
translated_text:
Samoan: Atonu e le’i mafaufauina e tagata, o le onosa’i ma le malamalama e tāua mo tagata femalagaa’i ua toe fo'i mai i aiga. 
English:: A Tonga is a traditional, wooden boat, with a narrow, low prow and a long, straight, and narrow deck.

text: ‘Aua ne’i galo ona fa’aopoopo se tupe mo le tau o ni visa e ono mana’omia, lafoga tuua, auala o fesoota’iga i le lau’ele’ele, ma isi mo nofoaga uma i fafo o Aferika.
translated_text:
Samoan: ‘Aua ne’i galo ona fa’aopoopo se tupe mo le tau o ni visa e ono mana’omia, lafoga tuua, auala o fesoota’iga i le lau’ele’ele, ma isi mo nofoaga uma i fafo o Aferika. 
English:: ‘Aua ne’i galo ona fa’aopoopo se tupe mo le tau o ni visa e ono mana’omia, lafoga tuua, auala o fesoota’iga i le lau’ele’ele, ma isi mo nofoaga if you are a female.

text: E iai nisi o tagatanuu Bishkek na tuua’ia tagata tetee mai le itu i saute mo le lē tausia o tulafono.
translated_text:
Samoan: E iai nisi o tagatanuu Bishkek na tuua’ia tagata tetee mai le itu i saute mo le lē tausia o tulafono. 
English:: Bishkek: The capital of Kyrgyzstan is in chaos as looters ransack stores and burn down buildings.

text: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
translated_text:
Samoan: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830. 
English:: The Kingdom of Samoa was a constituent country of the Kingdom of Luxembourg until 1830 when it became a sovereign state.

text: Talu mai le 1988, e tatau ona manino lelei pusa palota ina ia mafai ai e tagata palota ma tagata vaavaai ona molimauina e leai ni teutusi e i ai i le amataga o le palota ma e leai ni teutusi e fa’aopoopo i ai sei vagana ai i latou o tagata filifilia ua uma ona faitauina ma fa’atagaina.
translated_text:
Samoan: Talu mai le 1988, e tatau ona manino lelei pusa palota ina ia mafai ai e tagata palota ma tagata vaavaai ona molimauina e leai ni teutusi e i ai i le amataga o le palota ma e leai ni teutusi e fa’aopoopo i ai sei vagana ai i latou o tagata filifilia ua uma ona faitauina ma fa’atagaina. 
English: Samoa: Talu mai le 1988, e tatau ona manino lelei pusa palota ina ia mafai ai e tagata palota ma tagata vaavaai ona molimauina e leai ni teutusi e i ai i le amataga o le palota ma e leai ni teutusi e fa’aopoopo i ai sei vagana ai i latou o tagata filifilia ua uma ona faitauina ma fa’atagaina.

text: Na taʻua e le Palemia tausi o Julia Gillard, i le taimi o fa’atosina o le palota tuufa’atasi o le 2010, sa ia talitonu e tatau ona avea Ausetalia ma faigamalō republic i le fa’ai’uga o le nofoaiga a le Masiofo o Elisapeta II.
translated_text:
Samoan: Na taʻua e le Palemia tausi o Julia Gillard, i le taimi o fa’atosina o le palota tuufa’atasi o le 2010, sa ia talitonu e tatau ona avea Ausetalia ma faigamalō republic i le fa’ai’uga o le nofoaiga a le Masiofo o Elisapeta II. 
English:: Prime Minister: Julia Gillard

text: Ua fa’amamafa mai e le malō o Aialani le fa’anatinati ai o tulafono a le palemene e fa’asa'o ai lea tulaga.
